content:
SOFTWARE DEVELOPERS   Create a persistent web identifier (such as a Digital Object Identifier (DOI)) for your software. Three potential ways to get a persistent identifier are as follows:
  Provide clear acknowledgement instructions and place this language in the appropriate files and webpages.
  Provide a license with your software.
title: For Software Developers

content:
EARTHCUBE SOFTWARE CITATION As the EarthCube program winds down, these software citation recommendations are intended to provide guidance for current EC-funded software development projects on how to ensure persistent identification, citability, and discoverability for EarthCube-funded software.
These recommendations also provide templates and strategies for subsequent software development projects going forward.
title: Overview

content: SOFTWARE USERS  Cite the software you use, whether created by you or somebody else Use a consistent set of information in your software citations  ESIP Example Citation GuidelineAuthor. (Publication Year). Title. Version No. Publisher. PID URL. Access Date.
title: For Software Users
